entry.title: Great Consensus Cleanup Revival
entry.summary: The discussion involves the consideration of implementing a hard-fork, which is recognized as a significant alteration requiring careful timing and planning. The specific timing mentioned for this change is projected for the year 2106, indicating either a long-term view or a humorous exaggeration of the timeline required to undertake such a substantial update. This reflects an awareness of the complexities involved in making foundational changes to systems, software, or protocols that necessitate broad consensus and thorough testing to ensure stability and compatibility across the network or platform in question.
